evidence.claim: iLink Technologies utilizes AWS and Azure for their cloud services.
The company has capabilities in implementing HIPAA compliant solutions.
iLink supports HL7 and FHIR standards for healthcare data integration.
The company implements RESTful APIs for integration with EHRs.
They utilize Snowflake for scalable data warehousing solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence of X12 or EDI use cases found on the site.
